mapper.insert: insert into t_award_history_import_detail (import_his_id, stat_start_time, stat_end_time, status, fail_path, create_time, update_time) values (#{importHisId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{failPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_award_history_import_detail set import_his_id = #{importHisId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stat_start_time = #{statStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stat_end_time = #{statEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fail_path = #{failPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, import_his_id, stat_start_time, stat_end_time, status, fail_path, create_time, update_time from t_award_history_import_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
